item.title: PODFUN PODCAST EPISODE 96
item.description: Welcome back to podfun podcast On Today's Episode I chat about my most recent visit to Los Angeles and how i saw a guy fucking some girl on the eighth floor and chat about me running for president of the United States of America than me becoming a police officer just so I can torture children and we have a special sexy guest host for today's episode so much going on lots of dirty secrets everything flying on a closet on to today episode of the podfun podcast please if you got time go check to out our new web page over at www.sogreg.com or email me at pspplar@aol.com

item.title: PODFUN PODCAST Episode 95
item.description: We're back with a brand new episode of THE PODFUN PODCAST I just would like to say sorry you guys for the long waits and I had to have some time off to relax but the good news is we're back and better than ever we got more guests coming up soon actual famous people so stay tuned for the but any ways on today's episode I chat about the new porno move that i will star in called the pocket lint monster bay and i chat about some iphone news why I was on all the local new and radio a whole bunch of good stuff if you like to be a gas or would like to be on the show just e-mail me at podfun@gmail.com you can send a package for me to open up on the show to 79660 CORTEZ LANE 92253 CA IN LA QUINTA and please check out our new web page WWW.SOGREG.COM and tell your friends about the so that wAY they think you're crazy
